flawed_nl_solution:
Bucket A has 10 more seeds than bucket B: so there are 10 seeds + 30 seeds = <<10+30=40>>40 seeds in bucket A.
Bucket A and bucket B have 40 seeds + 30 seeds = <<40+30=50>>50 seeds together.
If there are 100 seeds in all the buckets, then bucket C has 100 seeds - 50 seeds = <<100-50=50>>50 seeds.
#### 50

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
